website_summaries.verdict: One of the only porcelain umbrella holders on the market, it adds a unique visual that is different from the typical wooden or metal holder.
pros: Extra-tall profile of the holder will keep one or two umbrellas secure at the same time
Different color and pattern options to fit your exact design style
cons: Porcelain finish can chip with enough force

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.. very very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this as an early Christmas gift for me and I could not be more pleased. It came packaged in two boxes, surrounded by thick styrofoam on all sides. Well protected! I was pleasantly surprised with the actual size. It is quite substantial. The background is gray, which suits me just fine and goes well with my decor. The flowers are detailed and beautiful. The bottom isn't completely level as it wobbles a tiny bit, but nothing worth worrying about. It is totally worth the price, which by the way happens to be at least $20 less than I've seen for this exact same product on other sights. Overall, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviews that say it's gray.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the (mis) labeling on the box and in the ad, the background color is not white, not antique white, not kind of white, not off white. It's gray. Which I knew before I ordered so I wasn't disappointed. Turned out to be a lovely dove gray which sets off the cobalt designs nicely. Heavy porcelain so I'm not afraid of it tipping over. The two I received are evenly shaped and flat bottomed. But definitely gray.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Umbrella Stand
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with this umbrella stand, it has no noticeable flaws as other reviews have, however it definitely has a grey background color rather than white as other reviews observed.
customer_reviews.author: MARGARITA COUGHLIN

customer_reviews.title: Be ware of cherry blossom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Warning!!! The cherry blossom is not the picture that shows when you select cherry blossom. The picture is dark blue with white small cherry blossom flowers. I received white & red instead?? Beautiful but not at all what I wanted and now I’m stuck with because I need it for an event tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Sturgess

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviewers - it is GRAY not white but a nice stand if you don't care about that.
customer_reviews.text: I did see the reviews but I thought I'd take a chance because it is larger than most. I like the fact that it is taller and sturdier than most of the ceramic umbrella stands I've seen, but the background color is definitely gray. I sent it back because it just didn't look good against my very white walls.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely shocked at the poor quality of this piece. For starters, the color is off (it's almost grey instead of white), however, the blue flowers look fine. The vase is not even a proper cylinder, as if squashed before being fired in the kiln (this is the most serious flaw). There was also a pile of rock hard crud in the bottom that I had to scrape out, perhaps swept up from the factory floor and dumped into the vase. The takeaway from all the above: there is absolutely NO quality control, which would have caught these issues. This is a fairly expensive item, and given what showed up at the house, should be priced about 75% lower.
customer_reviews.author: emily ✨

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and poorly packaged. Arrived broken, which was unsurprising given the quality. Difficult to return.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brozek

customer_reviews.title: Nicely weighted and handsome on the outside although the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely weighted and handsome on the outside although the inside was sloppily painted (cosmetic issue). But more importantly, water from a wet umbrella seeped through the bottom and wet the kitchen floor on the first use - even though there were no cracks. We are currently waiting for a coat of paint and then several layers of polyurethane to dry - hopefully that will fix the problem. If not, it's going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Gray and Blue.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely has a gray background with blue print. It is not white like the photo that is shown in the description. I kept it because I read this fact in previous reviews and bought a reduced price, previously opened package. I am using this inside of my closet so the gray background was not a huge factor. Had I purchased this expecting the photo I would have been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LeStew

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella Stand
customer_reviews.text: Both my neighbor and I bought one but had to paint the inside as it was not finished and looked cheap with the clay color showing through. Very nice size for canes and umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: MGC

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is nice and heavy and very well made. As umbrellas and golf clubs and such lean out of these things requiring the unit be heavy or it just falls over with the slightest bump. Very happy and very nice looking as you can see in photo.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robert S. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: Fine-looking umbrella stand, sturdy, sufficiently weighty to minimize chances of a tip-over. Value for the money -- absolutely. Looks terrific by the door. Precisely the umbrella stand I wanted in exactly the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Loup Garou

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful, sturdy umbrella stand, but the background color is definitely more gray than white. That's fine with me because the wall where it stands is gray, but be aware that the photograph is not an accurate depiction of the colors.
customer_reviews.author: socket-dc

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful Umbrella Stand
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Beautiful Umbrella Stand - very big, impressive - great addition to my blue and white collection - love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple Queen

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful, and even prettier in person. Bought this for my front door entrance and it is very pretty.Even more beautiful th
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, and even prettier in person. Bought this for my front door entrance and it is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Grey and blue--not true white
customer_reviews.text: Well. Hm. Arrived quickly and undamaged. Was the size represented. Why only 3 stars? The white is actually grey. Should have read, "Grey and Blue". So I can't sit this next to my other blue and white pots--the grey makes it look cheap. Hoped to put tall white stalks in it, but makes the grey tone too noticeable. Sitting alone across the room from other b&w objects it's ok. So that's what I did.
customer_reviews.author: quiltnewbee

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, tall and sturdy. PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height! It's heavy and sturdy. The last umbrella holder I ordered was way too short for anything but compact umbrellas. This is the replacement and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Better Than i Expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a sturdy, nice looking addition to my home. Very happy to have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Essaid

customer_reviews.title: Grey
customer_reviews.text: It’s grey. False advertising. Looks cheap. Would look good if white as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Maerch

customer_reviews.title: If you love blue & white
customer_reviews.text: Very nice umbrella holder. Very sturdy. Looks great in my hall entry.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Really like the size. Most umbrella holders are too short.

customer_reviews.title: Color problem
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as having a white background but it is actually gray

customer_reviews.title: Not As Photo Describes
customer_reviews.text: Not Porcelain or Ceramic but Tin Aluminum Alloy Painted Dark Grey Not Super White With Dark Navy Blue Tinsel - This Product Is Cheap Alternative to True Porcelain Umbrella Stands - Looks Good From A Distance But Not Up Close or At Internal Examination - I'll Will Use Until I Can Find An High Quality One

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and expected. Great price and lovely quality!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected absolutely beautiful well packed very quick shipping great deal overall

customer_reviews.title: nice piece
customer_reviews.text: matched perfectly with the pedestal stand that I purchased. Sits in my entry way for large umbrellas.

customer_reviews.text: product pictured was not what was received. What was received was a very large blue and white vase. It was returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Foran

customer_reviews.title: Weighty, lovely, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A bargain! Also I can’t believe I wasn’t charged extra to ship this thing. It already comes in a big padded box, and Amazon put that box into a coffin-sized box and padded that box as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This Porcelain Umbrella Stand was exactly what we wanted. The quality is excellent and we are very pleased. It replaces a similar stand we broke a number of years ago. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine B Pruyn

customer_reviews.title: Not cone proof
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this umbrella holder... but my dog needed to wear a cone of shame. It didn’t last long after all the chaos he created.

customer_reviews.title: Cherry blossom NOT blue & white!
customer_reviews.text: I usually read the reviews more closely, but missed an important one. The cherry blossom is not blue and white as pictured in the side bar! It is white with red flowers and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah J Perreault

customer_reviews.title: uniquely beautiful & elegant
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous piece!! Looks much more expensive than it is- sturdy, good weight to it, beautiful design, great size. All around- love it!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like this umbrella stand. It replaces an old one I had for many years. It is heavy and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price, exactly as advertised, arrived quickly and well packed.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with manufacturing flaw.

customer_reviews.title: It’s very nice!
customer_reviews.text: They are asking for twice the price on on other sites. It’s very unique and it’s beautiful!!

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in foyer!

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to store my canes for indoor and outdoor uses that fit the living area décor this works very nicely - quality, design and color were perfect. I get many compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Blue snd GRAY!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy. Very discouraging that it was described as blue and white and it's really blue and VERY gray background. Please describe accurately, it's too heavy to afford to return.

customer_reviews.title: The vase is beautiful and functions perfectly as an umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: The vase is beautiful and functions perfectly as an umbrella stand, except as noted elsewhere, gray porcelain instead of white.

customer_reviews.title: UGLY

customer_reviews.text: Nice piece. Good weight and keeps the floor dry when rainy umbrella come over. Picture is very true to product appearance.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Holds umbrellas and canes and looks good doing it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful storage for umbrellas by front door.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and can hold multiple size umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: This is a tall, sturdy and can hold multiple size umbrellas. It could also be used as a decorative vase in a foyer. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT blue and white.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful umbrella stand. The only problem is that it is blue and grey. The design is exactly as pictured and is clealy defined. I was very disappointed because it is described as blue and white. If you want a blue and grey umbrella stand, this one will please you.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: It is sitting in the living room and looks so lovely with all the blue willow accessories we have accumulated and continue to accumulate
customer_reviews.author: msmartha

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella stand came in perfect condition. Note to buyer
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella stand came in perfect condition. Note to buyer: It is blue on gray. There is no white. I love it anyway, so am keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: LMW

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, just one chunk broke and it fit seamlessly ...
customer_reviews.text: While it is lovely, be prepared with heavy duty glue when you get it. Fortunately, just one chunk broke and it fit seamlessly back in place. Easier to repair than send back for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella stand was exactly what I was looking for. I'm actually using it as a decorative stand for my eskrima sticks in the office at my martial arts school. Arrived on time and packaged correctly. Definitely would recommend to other buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Ryer

customer_reviews.title: Poor transfer print
customer_reviews.text: Ok item. Not white but grayish background. Poor transfer print. You get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: It is expected for the price. The background is ...
customer_reviews.text: It is expected for the price. The background is a little too grayish for me. If it would be white, I would give it more stars. It is worth the price though!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Blue & gray
customer_reviews.text: Heavy & sturdy. However, not blue & white as described & pictured. Definitely blue & gray as some had mentioned in their review but it still worked for me so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Schapker

customer_reviews.title: I love this umbrella stand is the right size I've been ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella stand is the right size I've been looking for. Added to my blue & white collections. The color is just right it looks fab! The delivery is earlier than expected since it came from the US to Australia. Excellent service. Thanks Amazon😀

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we looking for and adds to our entry way.

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella Stand
customer_reviews.text: The 24" porcelain oriental umbrella and cane stand is beautiful and was an excellent buy. I did have problems with the packing and shipping---because the first stand that I received was shattered. It came packed only with a styrofoam block in the top and bottom of the shipping box. There was no additional packing around it. However, after contacting Amazon.com and Oriental Furniture, they gladly replaced the broken item. I was very pleased with the service that I received from both companies.
customer_reviews.author: mimi1@nac

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: for a long time I was looking for an umbrella holder. This vase is just perfectly fit for this function. I like this oriental look.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Teplitsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece for storing long umbrellas. The blue and white floral design is pretty and the porcelain is substantial. Looks great in a foyer.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had the vacuum cleaner on and my dog got scared and broke it into many pieces. Inga Woitowich

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully created. High very convenient and really a conversational piece

customer_reviews.title: cane container
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella stand for my Mother-in-law for her to store her canes. It looks great and works well.

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy. Pat
customer_reviews.text: The background was supposed to be white. It is dark grey. Not too happy. Pat Shine
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Shine

customer_reviews.title: Lovely porcelain umbrella stand at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! The gray in the background matches our walls exactly so we don’t mind that it isn’t white. We live in a 100+ year old home and it compliments our hall tree perfectly and is the perfect place to keep the umbrellas and canes stored. The price was very reasonable and it was packed well and arrived unscathed. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fifinella56

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly high quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an umbrella stand for the entry to my condo unit in a hallway, but didn't want to spend a lot of money as it is actually outside of my condo. This is perfect and amazingly high quality for the price. My friend commented that she couldn't believe I would buy such an expensive piece to put out in the hall, and was shocked when I told her how little I paid. Very heavy, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: dpm

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece! Is just as described and shown. Very nice quality, especially for the price. Very poorly packed for shipment in flimsy box with fairly minimal styrofoam...arrived with a thump on my front porch in minus 2 degrees...but once brought in and left to warm up, no cracks. Might be a concern for other buyers...check ASAP once item arrives.
customer_reviews.author: KEM

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for one of these for YEARS, literally -- a blue and white umbrella holder at a reasonable price! I've seen them for $400, $500, and up... but this one was not only affordable, but nice and heavy, not likely to tip over and break, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Handsome piece
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. I put a heavy rock in the bottom to help prevent it from falling over ( how I lost the one I had before 😊 )
customer_reviews.author: Joycie

customer_reviews.title: arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: There was a minor delay in shipment--arrived when scheduled. Perfect condition, heavy and stable and well decorated. A pretty addition to the front hall.

customer_reviews.title: My Umbrella's Have Never Been Happier!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice

product_meta.title: Oriental Furniture 24" Floral Blue & White Porcelain Umbrella Stand
product_meta.description: Color:Blue & WhiteTwo-foot tall round umbrella stand, finished with a classic royal blue vine and flower pattern against traditional china white background. A practical and beautiful decorative accessory, great for storing umbrellas, canes, and walking sticks in a hall, foyer, or entry.
feature_bullets: Imported extra tall waterproof umbrella stand
Ming vine and flower design with antiqued ice crackle glaze

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
